text: You could create the company from a Custom Coded Action
I'll send you the necessary code one moment

<@U03R0BBLKG8>
```var axios = require('axios');

exports.main = async (event, callback) => {

var data = JSON.stringify({
  "properties": {
    "domain": event.fields.hs_email_domain,
    "name": event.fields.company,
  }
});

var config = {
  method: 'post',
  url: '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/companies>',
  headers: { 
    'content-type': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer XXXXX'
  },
  data : data
};

axios(config)
.then(function (response) {
  console.log(JSON.stringify(response.data));
  callback({
    outputFields: {
      hs_object_id: response.data.id
    }
  });
})
.catch(function (error) {
  console.log(error);
});
}```
You can change the input properties to be whatever you want (including the format output) but just keep the names the same.
Also on line 17 swap out "XXXX" for your token
that is awesome <@U01QVR44MEY> and thank you so much for reaching out with that!!!!
